name: pre-commit-checks
description: Run TypeScript and test checks before committing

commands.name: typescript-check
commands.command: cd apps/rendetalje/services/backend-nestjs && npx tsc --noEmit || echo 'Warning: TypeScript errors detected'

commands.name: quick-test
commands.command: cd apps/rendetalje/services/shared && npm test || echo 'Warning: Tests failed'
